stimulusHtml: Dr. Tonya surveyed 100 people, measured their height in inches, and asked whether they practiced gratitude. After analyzing the data, she claims that height causes people to be less grateful. Which of the following is a limitation of the study?
choicesHtml: The dependent variable was not manipulated.
The independent variable was not manipulated.
The results are correlational, not causational.
The laboratory setting of the situation does not reflect the “real world.”
